Understate: The claim understates the potential dangers of Covid-19 by suggesting that it is no longer classified as a high consequence infectious disease, while the expert's verdict clarifies that it is still dangerous.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there is no evidence linking mask-wearing to bacterial pneumonia, as stated by the expert.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence to support the claim that mask-wearing causes bacterial pneumonia, suggesting an exaggeration or overstatement in the original claim.
